# Quick Start {#quick}

## Cargo.toml

* To use `peroxide`, you should edit `Cargo.toml`
* Current document version is corresponding to `0.8`

    ```toml
    peroxide = "0.8"
    ```

## Import all at once

* You can import all functions & structures at once

    ```rust
    extern crate peroxide;
    use peroxide::*;

    fn main() {
        //Some codes...
    }
    ```
